scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $HOSTED_SERVICE_SUBGRAPH__MAINNET'
scripts.deploy:gnosis-chain: yarn prepare:gnosis-chain && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $HOSTED_SERVICE_SUBGRAPH__GNOSIS_CHAIN'
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && bash -c 'source .env || true && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ $HOSTED_SERVICE_SUBGRAPH__GOERLI'
